member.name: M:FileControlUtility.FileControl.OrganizeEnumeratedFiles(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Update the numbers from all filenames enumerated with the pattern <name> (<number>)<extension>, originated from the given file, in it's own directory.
The maximum quantity of enumerated files (including the original) can be informed in maxKeptFileCount, meaning the enumerated files, selected from highest number in descending way, will be kept and re-enumerated and the excess will be deleted. A value of 0 for maxKeptFileCount means all files will be kept.

member.name: P:FileControlUtility.TransferSettings.FileNameConflictMethod
member.summary:
What to do with filename conflicts.
FileNameConflictMethod.DO_NOT_MOVEfiles will be skipped.
FileNameConflictMethod.REPLACE_ALLreplace all files.
FileNameConflictMethod.REPLACE_DIFFERENTperfom a binary comparison, then replace, if they're not equal.
FileNameConflictMethod.RENAME_DIFFERENTperfom a binary comparison, then copy the file giving it an enumerated name, if they're not equal.

member.name: P:FileControlUtility.TransferSettings.ReenumerateRenamedFiles
member.summary:
Update the numbers from filenames in the destiny directory enumerated with the pattern <name> (<number>)<extension>, for each file from which they have originated. The maximum quantity of enumerated files (including the original) can be informed in MaxKeptRenamedFileCount, meaning the enumerated files, selected from highest number in descending way, will be kept and re-enumerated and the excess will be deleted.
Note: has effect only while using RENAME_DIFFERENT conflict method type.
Note: applies only to files subject to the transfer, not all files in the destiny directory. To enumerate all files use the OrganizeEnumeratedFiles method.

member.name: P:FileControlUtility.TransferSettings.MaxKeptRenamedFileCount
member.summary:
The maximum quantity of enumerated files in the destiny directory (including the original) to be kept and re-enumerated, for each file from which they have originated. Files with the highest enumeration will be selected and the excess will be deleted.
Note: 0 means all files will be kept.
Note: has effect only while using RENAME_DIFFERENT conflict method type and ReenumerateRenamedFiles = true.
